metadata.description: Rigorous, traceability-first system for generating architectural documentation with complete requirements-to-implementation traceability

plugins.name: specification-architect
plugins.description: A rigorous, evidence-based system that generates five interconnected architectural documents (research.md, blueprint.md, requirements.md, design.md, tasks.md, validation.md) with complete traceability. Implements a 6-phase process that eliminates AI-generated misinformation by mandating verification of all claims through web browsing and citations.
